name: KeyboardAccessoryView
description: View that allows replacing the default keyboard with other components

props.name: renderContent
props.description: Content to be rendered above the keyboard

props.name: kbInputRef
props.description:
The reference to the actual text input (or the keyboard may not reset when instructed to, etc.).
iOS only.

props.name: kbComponent
props.description: The keyboard ID (the componentID sent to KeyboardRegistry)

props.name: kbInitialProps
props.description: The props that will be sent to the KeyboardComponent

props.name: onHeightChanged
props.description: A callback for when the height is changed

props.name: onItemSelected
props.description: Callback that will be called when an item on the keyboard has been pressed.

props.name: onRequestShowKeyboard
props.description: Callback that will be called if KeyboardRegistry.requestShowKeyboard is called.

props.name: onKeyboardResigned
props.description: Callback that will be called once the keyboard has been closed

props.name: iOSScrollBehavior
props.description:
The scrolling behavior, use KeyboardAccessoryView.iosScrollBehaviors.X where X is:
NONE, SCROLL_TO_BOTTOM_INVERTED_ONLY or FIXED_OFFSET
iOS only.

props.name: revealKeyboardInteractive
props.description:
Show the keyboard on a negative scroll
iOS only.

props.name: manageScrollView
props.description:
Set to false to turn off inset management and manage it yourself
iOS only.

props.name: requiresSameParentToManageScrollView
props.description:
Set to true manageScrollView is set to true and still does not work,
it means that the ScrollView found is the wrong one and you'll have
to have the KeyboardAccessoryView and the ScrollView as siblings
and set this to true
iOS only.

props.name: allowHitsOutsideBounds
props.description:
Allow hitting sub-views that are placed beyond the view bounds
iOS only.

props.name: addBottomView
props.description:
Add a view beneath the KeyboardAccessoryView
iOS only.

props.name: bottomViewColor
props.description:
The bottom view's color as an hex string
iOS only.

props.name: useSafeArea
props.description:
Whether or not to handle SafeArea
iOS only.

props.name: usesBottomTabs
props.description:
Whether or not to include bottom tab bar inset
iOS only.
